author: costin
msg: Return more usefull information from recv, to help debug.

author: remm
msg: - Fix a bug where the wilcard mapping caused an array out of bounds if the
URI started with the path, but couldn't mapped to it, and it was in the first
position (found using the HTML manager help file).
- Fix same bug for context mapping, but this could only happen if there was no
root context (which doesn't happen too often).

author: costin
msg: Added more info to the log - the return code. It may help debug problems.

author: billbarker
msg: Add the 'processWelcomeResources' attribute to a place that it can be configured.
